wn_loc.c

00001 /*---------------------------------------
00002   WN_LOC.C
00003 ---------------------------------------*/
00004 
00005 #include "video/v_video.h"
00006 #include "window.h"
00007 
00008 
00009 /*#+func-------------------------------------------------------------------
00010    FUNCTION: wn_locate()
00011     PURPOSE: Locate cursor in window
00012      SYNTAX: int wn_locate(WINDOW *w, int row, int col);
00013 DESCRIPTION: Set cursor on position (row,col) relative to window's
00014              origin ( (0,0) = upper lefthand corner).
00015              N.B. Window w will become the top window.
00016     RETURNS: TRUE, or FALSE if error
00017     HISTORY: 910709 V0.1 - Initial version (always returns TRUE)
00018              14-Oct-1993 V0.2 - Now w->x2 and w->y2 are maximum limits.
00019                                 0,0 is minimum limit
00020 --#-func-------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00021 int wn_locate(WINDOW *w, int row, int col)
00022 {
00023   /*------------------------
00024     Check if window opened
00025   --------------------------*/
00026   if (!w)
00027     return(NO_WINDOW);
00028 
00029   /*------------------
00030     Activate window
00031   -------------------*/
00032   if (w!=top_window)
00033     wn_top(w);
00034 
00035   /*------------------------
00036     Check cursor position
00037   ------------------------*/
00038   if (row > w->y2)
00039     row = w->y2;
00040   if (col > w->x2)
00041     col = w->x2;
00042   if (row < 0)
00043     row = 0;
00044   if (col < 0)
00045     col = 0;
00046 
00047   /*------------------------------
00048     Set window cursor coordinates
00049   --------------------------------*/
00050   w->ccx = w->x1 + col;
00051   w->ccy = w->y1 + row;
00052 
00053   /*----------------------
00054     Set cursor in window
00055   -----------------------*/
00056   v_setcurpos(w->ccy,w->ccx);
00057   if (w->synflg)
00058     v_cursoron();
00059   else
00060     v_cursoroff();
00061 
00062   return(TRUE);
00063 }
